issue.title: [CF 1123] How to shorten my stagger amount
issue.body:
^1^T^SBuffOrDebuff^SHARMFUL ^SType^Sbuff ^SName^S124275;~`124274;~`124273 ^SShowTTText^B ^SSettingsPerView^T ^Sicon^T ^STextLayout^Sicon1 ^STexts^T ^N1^S[Stacks:Short] ^N2^S[Stacks~`*~`Duration:Round:Short] ^N3^S ^t^t^t^SEnabled^B ^t^N73101^S~`~| ^Sicon^^

How can i shorten the stagger amount on this string ? It still shows big numbers instead of shortening them like 10000- 10k.


> Posted by CurseForge user Drozo_Qoocla | Imported from CurseForge issue #1123 | Raw
